My first R Markdown file
============================

This is my first R markdown file.

Here, we're going load some data.

```{r}
library(datasets)
data(airquality)
summary(airquality)
```

Let's first make a pairs plot of the data.

```{r plot, fig.height=4}
pairs(airquality)
```

Here 's a regression model of ozone on wind, solar radiation, and temperature.

```{r Name, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
library(stats)
fit<-lm(Ozone ~ Wind + Solar.R + Temp, data =  airquality)
summary(fit)
rand<-rnorm(1)
```

`r rand`

Here's on unordered list:

 - First element
 
 - Second element

Here is a table of regressio coefficients.

```{r showtable, results="asis"}
library(xtable)
xt<- xtable(summary (fit))
print(xt,type = "html")
```
